numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a difference between the percentages of players of color and the percentages of head coaches of color in five professional sports.
2. In all five professional sports, the percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of head coaches of color.
3. The highest percentage of head coaches of color is 41%.
4. The highest percentage of players of color is 83%.
5. 41% is low compared to 83%.
6. In these professional sports, there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
7. I wonder why there are so few head coaches of color in these professional sports.
8. I wonder whether discrimination exists in these professional sports.
9. If discrimination exists in these professional sports, then discrimination may cause the percentage of head coaches of color to be low.
10. This situation impacts me strongly.
11. This situation impacts my community strongly.
12. This situation is important.
13. My community is predominantly white.
14. Some people in my community may not be aware of systemic racism in our country.
15. Systemic racism in our country affects people of color.
16. It is important that my community works to break down this racism.
17. It is important that my community ensures that race has no effect on opportunities that people are given.
18. These graphs show inequities in professional sports.
19. People need to be more aware of these inequities.
20. If people are more aware of these inequities, then these inequities can be ended.
21. This graph displays the percentages of players of color in professional sports.
22. This graph displays the percentages of coaches of color in professional sports.
23. This graph shows that there are fewer coaches of color than players of color.
24. In all five professional sports, the percentages of coaches of color are very low.
25. The headline is: Lack of Diversity In The Game.
